description:
★★★★★
Quickly check your Mega Millions and PowerBall Lottery numbers with LottoScope. 

Retrieve current and previous winning numbers at the launch of the app. Compare current winning numbers to your stored numbers and see the matches and prize values on one screen.

Store your favorite numbers by selecting the numbers on the My Numbers form or generate random numbers. 

LottoScope shows current and previous numbers, current Jackpot values, and prize tables for Mega Millions and PowerBall Lotteries.

Search all previous winning numbers.

Mega Millions and PowerBall are multi state lotteries.

List of States
☞ Both Lotteries: AR AZ CO CT DC DE GA IA ID IL IN KS KY MD MA ME MI MN MO MT NC NE ND NH NJ NM NY OH OK OR PA RI SC SD TN TX VT VA WA WI WV
☞ PowerBall Only: FL LA VI
☞ Mega Millions Only: CA

To learn more about these lotteries visit their home pages www.powerball.com and www.megamillions.com or visit Wikipedia at wikipedia.org/wiki/megamillions and wikipedia.org/wiki/powerball .

myGeeks.com is not affiliated with PowerBall, MegaMillions, or The Multi-State Lottery Association.
&113
